segments.text: What are your plans for this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to hire a bike . I think it would be a good idea to do some cycling on Sunday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sure it will be . It's been good so far this weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know a good place to hire bikes if you want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . That would be really helpful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But remember , be careful when you ride a bike . The traffic in Beijing can be dangerous .
segments.speaker: S1
